description: This file defines the RecipeRepository class, which provides methods for accessing and manipulating recipe data from an in-memory mock dataset. It includes methods to fetch all recipes, search by query, fetch by ID, and filter by tags, with simulated latency.

classes.name: RecipeRepository
classes.description: A repository class for managing recipe data, providing asynchronous methods to fetch, search, and filter recipes.

methods.name: RecipeRepository
methods.description: Constructor initializing the repository with an optional artificial delay for simulating network latency.

methods.name: getAllRecipes
methods.description: Returns a list of all recipes after a simulated delay.

methods.name: searchRecipes
methods.description: Searches for recipes containing the query string in the title or tags, case-insensitive.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a recipe by its unique ID, or null if not found.

methods.name: filterByTag
methods.description: Filters recipes that contain a specified tag, case-insensitive.
